attributes.action: Pedestrian crossing for Tessall Lane/Hollymoor way junction - B31, Birmingham.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for a safer pedestrian crossing to be placed next to the junction that turns into Hollymoor Way, B31 from Tessall Lane, B31.

This is a regular black spot for pedestrians being hit by cars and near misses. Especially children taking the route home from school and those wishing to access the local doctors surgery.

The only crossing near by, requires us to walk along a parking lay by which is just as unsafe when full of cars as pedestrians have to walk on the road to get to the doctors.
